channel.title: What's wrong with our education system?
channel.description:
(long way to go - draft)
A lot of things. The basic one, for the first 13 years or so, which most people begin around 4 years old, can learn a lot from alternative initiatives. http://eduontour.weebly.com/
And certificates are mostly broken. Even the better ones.
But here I want to talk about graduation, because that's what affects me the most.
